Html: Is it available. It currently only shows a flat line with a use of cooldowns at the very end of the fight on genetic solver.

I'll have to take a look, I never really tested genetic solver with fire. I'm suspecting that the sequence reconstruction actually undoes what the solver finds, because arcane bypasses the reconstruction.
It looks ok to me, do you have any specific problem where it doesn't look optimal?
Does it look flat even if it uses Combustion early? Because even in a 700sec fight the line is flat until the very end (presumably when it has Molten Fury available) where it uses Heroism, Potion.
Ah, I was using combustion in proc mode, I'll take another look.
